title: Introduction to C Programming
info: C is a foundational programming language known for its efficiency and low-level hardware access. It's essential for system programming and building robust software applications.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
info: Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems. In computer science, they're essential for data processing and decision-making. Studying algorithms is crucial for efficient problem-solving in programming and beyond.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
info: C++ is a versatile programming language used in DSA. It combines object-oriented features with efficient memory management, making it ideal for implementing complex data structures and algorithms.

title: Basic Data Structures
info: Basic data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues are fundamental building blocks in computer science. They organize and store data efficiently, enabling various algorithmic operations.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
info: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a paradigm that emphasizes organizing code into objects. Python's simplicity and readability make it an excellent choice for OOP, fostering modular and reusable code design.

title: Software Engineering
info: Software engineering is a disciplined approach to designing, developing, and maintaining software systems. It involves processes, tools, and methodologies to ensure the quality, reliability, and efficiency of software products.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
info: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a leading cloud computing platform, offering a vast array of services such as storage, computing, databases, and more. It enables organizations to scale and innovate flexibly in the cloud.

title: Database (MySQL)
info: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system. It stores, retrieves, and manages data, making it a popular choice for web applications and various software solutions due to its speed and reliability.

title: Problem-Solving Part
info: The problem-solving part involves analyzing issues, formulating strategies, and implementing solutions. It's a critical aspect of various fields, from programming and engineering to business and everyday life.
